alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:26AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 726 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunny Isles Beach, or near Hallandale, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Miami Beach, Plantation, Sunrise, Surfside, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Dania Beach, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Sunny Isles Beach and Opa-Locka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
